1477640.name: The Last Islands of Man
1477640.description:
The Last Islands of Man is a retro rpg that will test your time management and efficiency. Every fight you make, every step you take, every nap you sneak, might cost you. The waters of the world are rising. Major countries and cities have been washed away by the steady advance. Now your small village of Akalabeth might be the last. Refugees are now as common as the monsters in the dungeons. The world is more dangerous and our time remaining is dwindling. Can you save yourself from the villains around you? Can you save your family from the strengthening monsters crawling out of the depths?

The village of Akalabeth and the surrounding islands have been open to your exploration for years as you grew up. Instead of challenging the world you stayed close to home, playing with your friends, reading and not learning the skills needed to survive. You've ignored the perils facing the world, just as your parents have, and then one day it seems your mother has had enough ...

FEATURES:

Story mode (few battles, 1 hr gameplay)

Normal mode (challenging, 6-8 hr gameplay)
Active game time with a Timed challenge
Evolving and expanding maps
10 Classes with reactive team members
4 endings
500+ lines of written dialog
Male/female hero with 4 skins for each.
Custom soundtrack from Monplaisir and John Bartmann

Auto-Save and Achievements

STORY MODE

Exploration, Puzzles, Quests and Friends!

Don't be aimless while you explore, the end of humanity still approaches. Help others and they will help you. Learn as much as you can and do what no one else could do.

NORMAL MODE

Battles, Infliction, Struggle and Conquest!

Force your way through the waves of monsters emerging from the depths as you struggle to find a way to stop the rising sea waters. Find what you can, take what you must. You might be the only hope.

ACTIVE GAME TIME

The end of the world approaches whether you stand against it or not. Every conversation you have, flower you pick, battle you face will advance you forward in time. Don't waste your time or lose everything.

EVOLVING MAP

Break through barriers, explore the waves, dig into the earth. The water is stealing your land, you must claim something back. Don't let yourself be stuck by your own first impressions.

10 CLASSES & TEAMS

Choose your own Class for distinct Skills and Stats. Your recruit-able team will automatically match your selection to maintain balance. Pick your favorite knowing you can take on the challenge.

4 ENDINGS

Strength is a pathway, but not an answer. Get help and understand your true challenge. Or suffer the consequences of your actions, or lack there of.

HIDDEN DIALOG

Narrative takes a back seat as you struggle to complete your quest in time. You can talk to many, but should you? Learn the Lore to save your future, or make your own by chance alone. 

HERO CUSTOMIZATION

Sink yourself into the role of unlikely savior by choosing from 8 different skins.

UNIQUE SOUNDTRACK

Monplaisir's dirty guitar melodies braced with Bartmann's fuller orchestral efforts really push the experience of traveling the fields and digging through caves. 

A game by T.C. Forsdike
